welcome_message_body: Welcome to Owensboro, where the charm of the Ohio River meets the vibrant arts and music scene. Enjoy our famous BBQ, explore our beautiful downtown, and soak in the friendly atmosphere of our city. We're excited to have you here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daviess County Airport houses all the necessary facilities for passengers including check-in counters, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Evansville Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Evansville Regional Airport serves all private and charter flights and offers a variety of services for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
